Description:
Proven track record in sales and business development within the freight forwarding industry
Strong knowledge of the logistics and supply chain industry
Excellent communication and negotiation skills
Ability to build and maintain relationships with clients
Self-motivated and target-driven mindset
Ability to work independently and as part of a team
Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration or related fieldIf you are a dynamic and results-oriented individual with a passion for business development in the freight forwarding industry, we would love to hear from you. Please submit your resume and a cover letter outlining your relevant experience and why you are the ideal candidate for this role.We are currently seeking a highly motivated and results-driven Sales Manager to join our team in the Freight Forwarding industry. You will play a crucial role in driving our business growth by identifying and securing new business opportunities.Responsibilities:Identify and target potential clients in the freight forwarding industry
Develop and maintain strong relationships with existing clients
Generate new business leads through various channels, including networking events, industry conferences, and online platforms
Conduct market research to identify trends, competitors, and potential opportunities
Create and deliver compelling sales presentations to prospective clients
Negotiate and close deals to meet or exceed sales targets
Collaborate with internal teams to ensure smooth onboarding and implementation of new clients
Stay up-to-date with industry developments and trends to provide strategic insights and recommendationsJob Details
